title: AT Sackers Look-A-Like
content:
Is this typeface (or similar wide versions) available for purhcase? Is it a custom version of AT Sackers?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type\_question.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502200945/http:/typophile.com/files/type_question.jpg) | 4.57 KB |
author: typotekt

comments.content:
Except for the uppercase “E” [Zeppelin Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502200945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/zeppelin/light/charmap.html) comes extremely close.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Zeppelin_Lt.png)

‘A\*\*\*\*\*\*z Grotesk’ _( Light, Extended )_, may be another alternate..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20060502200945/http:/www.formlos.net/)
